<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached at White-hall, March 3, 1694/5, upon occasion of Her late Majesties death before the Right Honourable the Countess of Derby, and the rest of the mourning ladies / by Nicholas Brady ... ; published at the request of that honourable audience. Brady, Nicholas, 1659-1726.
[8], 28 p.
Printed for Richard Parker ..., London : 1695.
Half-title page reads: Mr. Brady's sermon at White-hall, upon occasion of the Queens death. Title within mourning borders. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
A sermon preached at White-hall, March 3, 1694/5, upon occasion of Her late Majesties death before the Right Honourable the Countess of Derby, and the rest of the mourning ladies / by Nicholas Brady ... ; published at the request of that honourable audience. Brady, Nicholas, 1659-1726.
[8], 28 p.
Printed for Richard Parker ..., London : 1695.
Half-title page reads: Mr. Brady's sermon at White-hall, upon occasion of the Queens death. Title within mourning borders. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Richard Parker
